Text: Planet Earth: The Future is a 2006 BBC documentary series on the environment and conservation, produced by the BBC Natural History Unit as a companion to the multi-award winning nature documentary "Planet Earth".

<Text: Planet Earth: The Future:  The programmes were originally broadcast on BBC Four immediately after the final three episodes of "Planet Earth" on BBC One.>
